thread.title: Your Horoscope for the Week of February 27
thread.title_full: Your Horoscope for the Week of February 27

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: Your Horoscope for the Week of February 27
text:
~*~PISCES~*~ With this past weekend’s epic new moon solar eclipse in your sign, you are feeling especially sensitive. Your emotions and instincts are high, and you are very tuned into what you want from your future in terms of finances and making sure you are living in line with your true values and priorities. Opportunities or ideas that come up Monday are worth pursuing. The annual union between the sun and your ruler, inspiring Neptune, on Wednesday asks you to dig even more deeply into what truly makes you happy, so you can make the most of the fresh start of your birthday month. Venus, the planet of love and beauty, begins a rare retrograde Saturday and over the next few weeks, you can find a lot of clarity about your purpose and your path.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below ~*~ARIES~*~ Breath deeply and let the epiphanies that are coming this week soak in. This past weekend’s epic new moon solar eclipse landed in your zone of secrecy, so it may have felt more like a soft buzz than a thunderous explosion, but things are very much shifting nonetheless, so pay close attention to everything that unfolds now. Monday is an especially epic day when your ruler, Mars, making a rare transit through your sign, opposes lucky Jupiter. If you’re single, there has never been a better time to get out and meet people. Your feelings are 100 percent on point Wednesday so don’t ignore than nagging instinct, whatever it may be. Venus, the planet of love, begins a retrograde Saturday and over the next few weeks, you have an unprecedented opportunity to dig deeply into what you really want. This spring can herald major changes, if you are ready and willing.
~*~TAURUS~*~ So much is clicking and falling into place for you from behind the scenes right now, you just need to trust in your vision and that everything will come full circle eventually. Last weekend’s new moon solar eclipse is catalyzing you in a new way in your community and collective activities. But exactly what does this look like and what role will you play? You are feeling all of that out now, and it’s extra important to pay attention to your intuition and take good care of your health. Your instincts are especially strong Monday and Thursday, and work-related changes that have been simmering could finally come to fruition now. Your ruler, Venus, the planet of love, moves into one of its rare retrograde periods Saturday. Over the next few weeks, it’s better to feel out all of your options and listen to your gut than take decisive actions.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below ~*~GEMINI~*~ Your career is on fire right now, and you are refining a bigger, long-term picture of what you want. The epic new moon solar eclipse this past weekend in your zone of fame and success is still echoing loudly, and over the next few weeks, you can hit major milestones and set even larger goals. Pay attention to a subtle, but powerful, brainstorm when the sun unites with inspiring Neptune on Wednesday. Your creativity is on fire, and you will be expanding out into your community and growing your alliances within your network. Romance shines this week too, especially if you are willing to think outside the box. Venus, the planet of love, moves into a rare retrograde Saturday. Tap into your most forward-thinking side in the upcoming month to come up with a fresh vision of what you truly want in that part of your life.
~*~CANCER~*~ You have been changing and growing and shifting focus so much over the past few months that the epic aspects heating up this week almost feel like old news! The mega-powerful new moon solar eclipse in your zone of vision and travel last weekend is helping you to see exactly which options will and won’t work moving forward, so you can adjust your strategy appropriately when it comes to your career. And work, and your work/life balance, are under the microscope Monday and Thursday. It will be hard to undo choices you make now, so take action accordingly. But the changes will keep coming, especially since Venus, the planet of attraction, begins a rare retrograde in your zone of fame and success Saturday. All of your career dreams could come true over the next few months if you are truly in line with what you want.
~*~LEO~*~ The soul-searching continues. Last weekend’s epic new moon solar eclipse in your zone of privacy and intimacy is lighting a fire deep down inside you to figure out exactly what is feeling right and what is feeling wrong, in your life. The good news is that all kinds of ideas and information are popping up, seemingly out of nowhere, to give you just the message you need at exactly the right time. Pay extra-close attention to what others are telling you Monday and Thursday. But when the sun unites with extra-sensitive Neptune on Wednesday, look within, and don’t go against your intuition! Venus, the planet of love, begins a rare retrograde Saturday. Over the next few weeks and months, you have unparalleled opportunities for change and healing if you are ready to move in a new direction.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below ~*~VIRGO~*~ The new moon solar eclipse in your zone of relationships this past Sunday is catalyzing some major changes in that part of your life. It may finally be time to rid yourself of toxic partnerships, in love or work. So you can replace them with people whose contributions are up to par! You will know which direction to go based on how in line their actions are with your values. Clear signs arrive Monday and Thursday, so it’s hard to keep looking in the other direction. If you’re single, your chances of finding someone or creating something meaningful are sensational, so just trust yourself and what you want. But with Venus, the planet of love, moving into a rare retrograde Saturday, your perceptions are shifting, so just be aware that everything is fluid right now, and be patient with the situation.
~*~LIBRA~*~ You have been ultra busy recently, and you may end up backtracking on some situations you thought were already resolved. This past weekend’s new moon solar eclipse in your zone of work and routine is majorly shaking up your vibe. The time has never been better to amp up your health regimen, so commit to yourself! But major relationships are in an unpredictable phase, and you could end up getting some news that throws you for a loop Monday or Thursday. Try to trust that changes of plan are for the best, but if someone keeps dropping the ball, it may be time to move on from a certain relationship. Your ruler, the planet of love, Venus, moves into a rare retrograde Saturday, and over the next few weeks, take a hard look at which alliances are really working for you.
~*~SCORPIO~*~ This week is very much still an echo of last Sunday’s epic new moon solar eclipse in your zone of creativity, sending major ripples through both your love life and professional world. An unexpected snafu Monday at work could actually turn out to be a very lucky break so just go with it. The sun makes its annual conjunction with inspirational Neptune on Wednesday, and you are like a psychic sponge, so pay close attention to ideas and intuition. Venus, the planet of love, moves into one of its very rare retrograde periods Saturday. Start refining your vision for how you can make your work life as smooth, and satisfying, as possible.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below ~*~SAGITTARIUS~*~ Ripples continue to run through both your domestic sector and your love life, thanks to this past Sunday’s monumental new moon solar eclipse. Even a big-picture person like you needs a cozy home life, and your vision for what nurtures you and makes you happy is shifting. If you are single this week, you could get an introduction to someone who shifts your perspective in a big way, so let yourself go and have fun. But with the sun also joining up with sensitive Neptune on Wednesday, make sure you are taking care of your own emotional needs too. Venus, the planet of love, moves into a rare retrograde Saturday, so over the next few weeks, take a close look at what truly brings joy into your life.
~*~CAPRICORN~*~
